The Consultation Process

Understanding Your Needs

⏱️ Fixed Timelines, Real Results
  • 01

    Free Inspection & Assessment

    Every project starts with listening. What are your basement goals? During consultation, we inspect inside and outside thoroughly, identify all existing issues, and discuss your plans. No sales pressure - just straightforward advice about what your basement needs.

  • 02

    Clear Solutions & Transparent Pricing

    We explain viable options clearly and provide detailed written estimates. Our quotes include clear pricing and note any factors that could affect final cost. The right solution depends on your specific situation, goals, and budget.

  • 03

    Professional Execution & Warranty

    Most waterproofing completes within a week. Underpinning typically finishes in under 5 weeks. We explain the work, stick to timelines, and keep disruption minimal. All work backed by comprehensive warranties.

Frequently Asked Questions

Basement waterproofing costs typically range from $3,000 to $15,000 depending on the method and size of your basement. Interior waterproofing averages $70-$150 per linear foot, while exterior waterproofing costs $150-$300 per linear foot.

Most homeowner insurance policies don't cover gradual water damage or seepage. However, sudden flooding from burst pipes may be covered. We recommend checking with your insurance provider and considering our financing options.

Quality waterproofing with proper installation lasts 20-30 years or more. We provide a lifetime warranty on our waterproofing work, giving you complete peace of mind.

The best method depends on your specific situation. Exterior waterproofing provides the most comprehensive protection, while interior systems are excellent for managing water that's already entering. We'll recommend the best solution after a free inspection.
